name: Sands China Ltd.
description: Sands China Ltd. is a leading developer and operator of integrated resorts and casinos in Macao, a key gaming and entertainment destination in Asia. Established in 2004, Sands China is a subsidiary of Las Vegas Sands Corp., and it plays a pivotal role in transforming Macao into a world-class tourism destination. The company owns and operates several iconic properties, including The Venetian Macao, The Parisian Macao, and Sands Macao, each offering a unique blend of luxury accommodations, world-class dining, and entertainment options. Sands China is committed to sustainability and corporate social responsibility, focusing on community engagement and environmental conservation initiatives. With a diverse portfolio of attractions and facilities, Sands China not only contributes to the local economy but also enhances the tourism experience for millions of visitors each year. Its innovative approach to hospitality and entertainment continues to set industry standards, making Sands China a prominent player in the global gaming sector.
